Summary: IT was jet black had no windows Itwas like a triangle there was no noise while we looking at it and blinked with no noise it was gone
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend of mine was working in her flowerbeds and we had just say when we got that flower bed done we were going to lunch .And then a shadow came over the bed we looked up and there was something satting over the trees just tree top high not making any noise just hovering Ilooked at it it was triangle shape in the middle of it was rasied up like were the cockpit was but there was no windows I looked at my friend and looked right back and it was gone no noise no wind just gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Poukeepsie
This sighting has never been favorited.
